mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.reference, e.available, e.discarded, et.id AS "ELEMENT_TYPES_id", et."name" AS "ELEMENT_TYPES_name" FROM "ELEMENTS" AS e LEFT JOIN "ELEMENT_TYPES" AS et ON et.id = e."ELEMENT_TYPES_id" WHERE e.id = #{id};
